data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Victoria have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Fernando Hernandez Gomez, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Throw-in Toluca.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Toluca.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
Michael Estrada for Toluca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Toluca a goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Haret Ortega (Toluca) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Toluca.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the away team in Aguascalientes.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca.
Haret Ortega scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 18, Raul Lopez with an assist there.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Toluca throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Toluca have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 22, Toluca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
Toluca drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 25, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Necaxa.
Free kick Necaxa.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 27, Attention is being given to Tolucaâ€™s Haret Ortega and play has been suspended briefly.
Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Goal! Necaxa go level at 1-1 through Lucas Passerini in Aguascalientes.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Michael Estrada is booked for the away team.
Haret Ortega for Toluca is back on the field again.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Necaxa.
In Aguascalientes, Lucas Passerini (Necaxa) misses the target with a header.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Toluca in the half of Necaxa.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Necaxa.
Throw-in Toluca.
In the minute 40, In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Necaxa to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 45, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
At Estadio Victoria the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Rubens Sambueza (Toluca) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half is underway in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 47, Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Toluca in the half of Necaxa.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 52, Toluca have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Free kick Necaxa.
Toluca's William da Silva has been booked in Aguascalientes.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
In the minute 56, Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Alex Zendejas (Necaxa) has received a yellow card from Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 58, Toluca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Toluca a goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Necaxa.
In the minute 61, Unai Bilbao scores to make it 2-1 at Estadio Victoria.
Great play from David Cabrera to set up the goal.
Free kick for Toluca in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Toluca.
Toluca's Michael Estrada breaks free at Estadio Victoria. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Necaxa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toluca's half?
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Necaxa a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Toluca make their first substitution with Kevin Castaneda replacing Michael Estrada.
Enrique Triverio is on a sub for Antonio Rios for Toluca.
In the minute 71, Isaias Violante is replacing Haret Ortega for the away team.
Rubens Sambueza gets an equalizer for Toluca. The score is now 2-2.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 75, Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Maximiliano Salas is on a sub for Ian Gonzalez for Necaxa.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of Toluca.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 79, At Estadio Victoria, Toluca are penalized for being offside.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
Toluca make their fourth substitution with Adrian Mora replacing Diego Gonzalez.
In the minute 81, Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Necaxa in Aguascalientes.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 84, Necaxa to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
At Estadio Victoria, Alexis Canelo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 86, Julio Gonzalez for Necaxa has been booked by Fernando Hernandez Gomez and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick Necaxa.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Necaxa throw-in in Toluca's half.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
The match has come to a close in Aguascalientes. The final score is 3-2.
Goal! Alex Zendejas heads Necaxa into a 3-2 lead.
Lucas Passerini instrumental with a fine assist.
Jose Guadalupe Cruz Nunez is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Victoria with Jair Pereira replacing Juan Delgado.
